DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the total score of an individual assessed with the Oral Mucositis Rating Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research tool used to assess inflammation in the mouth and classification of oral changes after bone marrow transplant and chronic graft versus host disease._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
